page.title: 03SHAW HEATH POST OFFICE
page.content: The Post Office is part of a small shop which at one time was the only shop serving the Shaw Heath area. New shops have been built a little further away but the Post Office has grown with the area. All the usual transactions can be made, e.g. stamps, postal orders, Giro banking, payment of pensions and child benefit. The Post Office section occupies only about one fifth of the floor space, the rest is a general store which has a wide variety of goods. There is a large seletion of food, magazines, greeting cards and household goods. Three women work in the shop. Most of the customers are local people but because the shop is on the main road it does attract casual shoppers.{ {
